# ziti_external_jwt_signer (Data Source)

Ziti External jwt signer Data Source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_external_jwt_signer" "test_external_jwt_signer_data" {
  name = "test_external_jwt_signer"
}

output "ziti_jwt_signer" {
  value = data.ziti_external_jwt_signer.test_external_jwt_signer_data
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `cert_pem` (String) Certificate PEM
- `claims_property` (String) Claims Property
- `client_id` (String) Client ID
- `enabled` (Boolean) Enabled
- `external_auth_url` (String) External Auth URL
- `id` (String) Identifier
- `jwks_endpoint` (String) Jwks Endpoint
- `kid` (String) Kid
- `name` (String) Name of the external jwt
- `scopes` (List of String) Scopes List
- `target_token` (String)
- `use_external_id` (Boolean) Use External ID Flag

### Read-Only

- `audience` (String) Audience
- `issuer` (String) Issuer
- `tags` (Map of String) External jwt signer Tags
